channel.title: dewiweb – Spatialisation
channel.description: Recent content in Spatialisation on dewiweb

item.title: Spatial audio & spatialisation
item.description:
trajectoires

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/trajectoires

Mobile/web application for spatial audio control via OSC. Fork of the original, adapted and used as a working base.

  • Language: Objective-C
  • Usage: OSC control of sound sources from mobile

SPARTA

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/SPARTA

Collection of VST audio plugins for spatial audio production, reproduction and visualisation. Suite developed by Aalto University.

  • Language: C++
  • Licence: GPL-3.0
  • Original project

VISR-Production-Suite

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/VISR-Production-Suite

Suite of audio plugins for spatial production, from the S3A research project.

  • Language: C++
  • Official site
